summary: Preference for the (x)ERN stack, transforming designs into responsive webs. I'm fluent in HTML5, CSS3, and (Java|Type)Script.
I've got Fullstack experience, but I'm most enthusiastic about FrontEnd development.
I do love staying up-to-date with the latest trends, and my commitment is to deliver work that can be easily maintained and evolved without too much suffering (if possible).
